Created an attachment (id=80045)
patch

Fix for incorrectly diposing shared images from image registries. When the view was closed, shared images were disposed.

Created an attachment (id=80049)
org.eclipse.ui.views.log.patch

Updated Darin's patch to include another area.

This was the result of moving to using the default image registry versus PDE's custom one.

Markus, we are on a bad start this weekend.

I think we should go back to Monday where everything was all happy and peaceful :)
